title: Ivern's Candy King skin is just simply delightful
body:
i love everything about this new champion, but the candy king skin is the icing on the cake! 

i can honestly say that just from first looks that this is one of my favourite skins ever

even the grass from his bushes are blue, the exact colour i was hoping they'd be 

everything about it is just so cute with a licorice sheen

god bless the people who designed this skin

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=resumed,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hcz1RGMw,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-21T01:50:00.779+0000)
>
> i love everything about this new champion, but the candy king skin is the icing on the cake! 
> 
> i can honestly say that just from first looks that this is one of my favourite skins ever
> 
> even the grass from his bushes are blue, the exact colour i was hoping they&#039;d be 
> 
> everything about it is just so cute with a licorice sheen
> 
> god bless the people who designed this skin

Have you heard the VO yet? I'm not sure when that's out there.
all i know about it so far is the "in case anyones hungry i poop fruit" line but im not sure if thats exclusive to the skin
If you're reading the One Piece manga, this skin fits the theme of the current so much. All the villains are designed after sweets and they're all practically insane.

> [{quoted}](name=resumed,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hcz1RGMw,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-21T01:50:00.779+0000)
>
>icing on the cake! 

This pun is so sweet.
I know right, I don't even jungle but I'm considering buying it just for the hell of it.
